properties.description: please refer to the NSIP Entity Message Topic Requirements  documentation

source: #### If dev or test, limiting the number of output rows and anonymisation of the sensitive fields is required.

# from notebookutils import mssparkutils
# storage_account=mssparkutils.notebook.run('/utils/py_utils_get_storage_account')

# is_dev_or_test_env = 'dev' in storage_account or 'test' in storage_account
# max_limit = 20 if is_dev_or_test_env else 100000000

# spark.sql(f"SET MAX_LIMIT = {max_limit}")

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_data

    AS

SELECT DISTINCT

	T1.ProjectName 											AS ProjectName,
	T1.Decision  											AS Decision,
	T1.ProjectStatus  										AS PublishStatus,
	T1.ExamTimetablePublishStatus 							AS ExamTimetablePublishStatus,
	T1.Sector 												AS Sector,
	T1.ProjectType 											AS ProjectType,
	T1.Stage 												AS Stage,
	T1.CaseReference 										AS CaseReference,
	T1.CaseID 												AS CaseID,
	T1.CaseNodeID											AS CaseNodeID,
	T1.ProjectLocation 										AS ProjectLocation,
	T1.ProjectEmailAddress 									AS ProjectEmailAddress,
	T1.Region 												AS Region,
	T1.Easting 												AS Easting,
	T1.Northing 											AS Northing,
	T1.Transboundary 										AS Transboundary,
	T1.WelshLanguage 										AS WelshLanguage,
	T1.MapZoomLevel 										AS MapZoomLevel,
	T1.ProjectDescription 									AS ProjectDescription,
	T1.SoS 													AS SecretaryOfState,
	T1.DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite 							AS DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,
	T1.DateOfDCOAcceptance 									AS DateOfDCOAcceptance,
	T1.AnticipatedDateOfSubmission 							AS AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,
	T1.AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific 				AS AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific,
	T1.DateOfDCOSubmission 									AS DateOfDCOSubmission,
	T1.DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen 						AS DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,
	T1.DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose 					AS DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,
	T1.DateRRepAppearOnWebsite 								AS DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,
	T1.ConfirmedStartOfExamination 							AS ConfirmedStartOfExamination,
	T1.DateTimeExaminationEnds								AS DateTimeExaminationEnds,
	T1.Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate						AS Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,
	T1.Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline	 			AS Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,
	T1.DateOfRecommendations 								AS DateOfRecommendations,
	T1.ConfirmedDateOfDecision 								AS ConfirmedDateOfDecision,
	T1.Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline 					AS Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,
	T1.DateProjectWithdrawn 								AS DateProjectWithdrawn,
	T1.Section46Notification 								AS Section46Notification,
	T1.DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject 						AS DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,
	T1.ScreeningOpinionSought 								AS ScreeningOpinionSought,
	T1.ScreeningOpinionIssued 								AS ScreeningOpinionIssued,
	T1.ScopingOpinionSought 								AS ScopingOpinionSought,
	T1.ScopingOpinionIssued 								AS ScopingOpinionIssued,
	T1.DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision 						AS DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,
	T1.DateSection58NoticeReceived 							AS DateSection58NoticeReceived,
	T1.PreliminaryMeetingStartDate 							AS PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,
	T1.DeadlineForCloseOfExamination 						AS DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,
	T1.DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation 				AS DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,
	T1.DeadlineForDecision 									AS DeadlineForDecision,
	T1.JRPeriodEndDate 										AS JRPeriodEndDate,
	T1.ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose 			AS ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,
	CASE
        WHEN T3.TypeOfInvolvement LIKE '%Operations%Lead%'
        THEN T3.ContactID
        ELSE NULL
    END 													AS OperationsLeadID,
	CASE
        WHEN T3.TypeOfInvolvement LIKE '%Operations%Manager%'
        THEN T3.ContactID
        ELSE NULL
    END 													AS OperationsManagerID,
	CASE
        WHEN T3.TypeOfInvolvement LIKE '%Case&Manager%'
        THEN T3.ContactID
        ELSE NULL
    END 													AS CaseManagerID,
	T1.NsipOfficerID 										AS NSIPOfficerID,
	T1.NsipAdministrationOfficerID 							AS NSIPAdministrationOfficerID,
    '' 													    AS LeadInspectorID,
    T1.InspectorID 											AS InspectorID, -- surrogate key
	''													    AS EnvironmentalServicesOfficerID,
	'' 													    AS LegalOfficerID,
	T1.DateOfNonAcceptance 									AS dateOfNonAcceptance,
	T1.Rule6LetterPublishDate 								AS rule6LetterPublishDate,
	T1.NotificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM 	AS notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM,
	T1.NotificationDateForEventsDeveloper 					AS notificationDateForEventsDeveloper,
	T1.Rule8LetterPublishDate 								AS rule8LetterPublishDate
	-- main_sourcesystem_fact.Description AS SourceSystem

FROM odw_harmonised_db.casework_nsip_data_dim T1
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_inspector_cases_dim T2 
	ON T1.CaseReference=T2.CaseReference 
		AND T2.IsActive='Y'
LEFT JOIN odw_harmonised_db.casework_contact_information_dim T3
	ON  T1.ApplicantEmailAddress = T3.Email  
		AND CAST(T1.CaseCreatedDate AS date) = CAST(T3.CaseCreatedDate AS date)
		AND T3.IsActive='Y'

-- LIMIT ${MAX_LIMIT}

%%sql

CREATE OR REPLACE TABLE odw_curated_db.nsip_data

USING delta

AS

SELECT 								
    ProjectName,										
    Decision,									
    PublishStatus,						
    ExamTimetablePublishStatus,								
    Sector,								
    ProjectType,										
    Stage,									
    CaseReference,										
    CaseID,				
    CaseNodeID,						
    ProjectLocation,									
    ProjectEmailAddress,									
    Region,										
    Easting,											
    Northing, 										
    Transboundary,										
    WelshLanguage,									
    MapZoomLevel,									
    ProjectDescription,									
    SecretaryOfState,						
    DateProjectAppearsOnWebsite,							
    DateOfDCOAcceptance,						
    AnticipatedDateOfSubmission,				
    AnticipatedSubmissionDateNonSpecific,				
    DateOfDCOSubmission,						
    DateOfRepresentationPeriodOpen,					
    DateOfRelevantRepresentationClose,					
    DateRRepAppearOnWebsite,					
    ConfirmedStartOfExamination,						
    DateTimeExaminationEnds,						
    Stage4ExtensionToExamCloseDate,			
    Stage5ExtensionToRecommendationDeadline,				
    DateOfRecommendations,					
    ConfirmedDateOfDecision, 					
    Stage5ExtensionToDecisionDeadline,					
    DateProjectWithdrawn,						
    Section46Notification, 						
    DatePINSFirstNotifiedOfProject,						
    ScreeningOpinionSought,							
    ScreeningOpinionIssued,							
    ScopingOpinionSought,							
    ScopingOpinionIssued,						
    DeadlineForAcceptanceDecision,						
    DateSection58NoticeReceived,						
    PreliminaryMeetingStartDate,						
    DeadlineForCloseOfExamination,				
    DeadlineForSubmissionOfRecommendation,				
    DeadlineForDecision,					
    JRPeriodEndDate,			
    ExtensionToDateRelevantRepresentationsClose,											
    OperationsLeadID,											
    OperationsManagerID,											
    CaseManagerID,										
    NSIPOfficerID,						
    NSIPAdministrationOfficerID,												
    LeadInspectorID,										
    InspectorID,											
    EnvironmentalServicesOfficerID,						
    LegalOfficerID,							
    dateOfNonAcceptance,								
    rule6LetterPublishDate,	
    notificationDateForPMAndEventsDirectlyFollowingPM,	
    notificationDateForEventsDeveloper,					
    rule8LetterPublishDate
    
FROM odw_curated_db.vw_nsip_data
